items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to backward square
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
items.postText: Vamsi: "how and when rubel became such a tidy bowler, is he really bowling well or india is too cautiously playing him !!" --- He's having a good tournament. Today, he's been the only bowler across both sides who has consistently got it to swing.

items.text: length ball skidding in at off stump. Pokes it between cover and extra cover and makes Jadhav scramble
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on leg stump, steps out and offers the full face as he taps to long-on
short of a length on off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Jadhav, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, gently nudged to deep square's right
short ball just outside off, punched to cover's right and the diving Mehidy can't stop that cleanly
items.postText:
Sachin: "Why take Rubel take off attack especially when you need wickets and he is bowling well. This game is not going to 50 overs."

KP: "Varun,please provide me some stats brother.In how many finals since 2011 WC ,Virat,Rohit or Shikhar have played match winning knocks for India? (multi nation tournaments).Because nothing comes to my mind? Anything to do with pressure handling?" ---- Don't have the time right now, but these are the numbers for the Rohit-Dhawan stand in ODI finals - 19, 23, 0, 35

items.text: length on off stump. Tapped down the pitch off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length ball angled across the corridor. Turns it to midwicket with a closed face
items.postText: Rajkumar Bhaska: "Even though Bangladesh is bowling well. They don't have enough bowlers to keep it tight. Dhoni would have calculated already against whom to score run and not. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length outside off, stabbed on the up to extra cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped to mid-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length outside off, sliced to sweeper cover on the rise
full on off stump, driven to mid-off's right and he's clutching his hamstring after completing the run
items.postText:
Out comes Farhart, the physio. Jadhav had injured his hamstring playing for CSK in the IPL earlier this year. After winning a match for them on one leg, if you remember. He's had a good comeback into international cricket, but it doesn't look good at the moment. He's chucked the right pad off and is on the floor...

Shashank tells me that it seems to be the stretches he did after that ball with the physio which made the discomfort apparent. This isn't the same hamstring as the one during the IPL. That was a grade-2 tear to the left hamstring. Now, he's strapped the right hamstring and he's back.

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Jadhav, no run

items.text: well done. He's limping after, but it was vital that he got really low for this shot. It was a full ball, he got it on the full and swept it to the deep backward square boundary
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Jadhav, FOUR runs

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped into the midwicket region
length ball wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, jammed to midwicket
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.postText: Darshan Mandali: "It doesn't look good for jadhav. He is struggling very badly. We cannot lose our golder arm for another injury."

items.text: he's got him! MS Dhoni has stabbed away from the body as this slants across him and it's a simple catch for Mushfiqur. Every Indian in the stadium is stunned. A loud burst from the Bangladesh fans. This is a massive moment.

dismissal.text: MS Dhoni c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mustafizur Rahman 36 (67b 3x4 0x6) SR: 53.73

items.text: overpitched on the legs, confidently flicked to deep square's left
length ball at the stumps, walks down at it and taps to midwicket off the inside half
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadhav, no run

items.text: in the air but safely to sweeper's left. Walks at it again and goes with hard hands at this length ball. No control on it, it's a slice
items.postText: IMMAD : "What a time to get Dhoni out. This game will be another cliffhanger. Absolutely amazing scenes. Asia cup has been quite brilliant. So many close contests."

items.text: length ball curving in at off stump, blocked solidly into the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadeja, no run
